name: SE-SOFT Configuration File
summary: Learn about .OPTIONS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OPTIONS files also used by SE-SOFT's portable programs, which use the ".exe.options" compound extension.
NOTE: The OPTIONS file extension may also be used by other programs for storing generic configuration files.

description: Settings file used by SE-SOFT's SE-DesktopApps, such as SE-Explorer, SE-Launcher, and SE-Player; saves configuration options in an XML format; used for saving program defaults and user-selected options.
